stylePrompts.prompt: in the style of a 17th-century Baroque oil painting, with intense chiaroscuro, thick impasto brushwork, deep shadows, and rich earth tones. Emphasis on dramatic realism and expressive texture throughout
intricately detailed steampunk aesthetic with aged brass textures, exposed clockwork mechanisms, and Victorian-industrial materials. Smoky atmosphere with warm, diffused lighting
inspired by Art Nouveau masters, featuring flowing organic lines, botanical ornamentation, subtle gold flourishes, and a glowing pastel palette. Stylized elegance with softly blended textures
futuristic nighttime cityscape with sharp reflections, glowing neon accents, and atmospheric depth. Ultra-detailed surfaces—glass, chrome, raindrops—captured in cinematic light
in the manner of Edo-period Japanese woodblock prints, with stylized clouds, flat color planes, delicate linework, and natural subject matter arranged in flowing, asymmetrical compositions
delicate pastel palette, light-filled composition, and intricate ornamental details inspired by 18th-century French Rococo. Light silks, florals, and airy brushwork evoke aristocratic refinement
monumental abstract forms rendered in textured concrete, iron, and glass. Cold, architectural minimalism with stark shadows and rhythmic composition, emphasizing mass and material
hyper-detailed cosmic vistas, with glowing nebulae, crystalline stars, gaseous clouds, and planetary forms. Grand compositions that suggest astronomical scale and subtle motion
inspired by high gothic cathedrals, with vertical stone forms, filtered light, and intricate carved textures. Cool, desaturated palette and an air of quiet monumentality
high-fidelity fantasy realism with cinematic composition, intricate costume and environment detail, ambient light and weather effects. A visual echo of fine book illustration
sharp-focus, high-dynamic-range studio photography with rich, natural skin tones, balanced light falloff, and luxurious material textures. Carefully composed for timeless clarity
high-resolution street photography aesthetic with layered depth of field, spontaneous framing, and textural urban realism. Subtle lens grain and naturalistic color grading
moody monochrome with strong directional light, deep shadows, and grain texture reminiscent of mid-century analog film stock. Emphasis on negative space and visual suspense
shot in the style of 8x10 large format photography, capturing ultra-fine textures, tonal gradients, and environmental detail. Diffuse natural light and precise focus plane
surreal photographic composition with shallow depth of field, misty atmospherics, dreamlike lighting, and softened textures. Feels cinematic and otherworldly without overt fantasy
inspired by early Renaissance frescoes, with subdued earth pigments, idealized anatomical forms, gentle perspective, and matte, plaster-like textures that suggest age and history
in the tradition of scientific botanical illustration, with razor-sharp renderings of flora, watercolor tinting, fine stippling, and aged vellum tonality
fragmented geometric abstraction with overlapping forms and multifaceted perspectives. Dry-brush textures and a subdued earthy palette inspired by early 20th-century Cubism
monochromatic ink wash technique with minimalist composition, textured brushstrokes, and soft diffusion. Inspired by Japanese sumi-e painting and wabi-sabi aesthetics
strange and uncanny compositions using realistic textures—skin, fabric, woodgrain—assembled in illogical but beautiful ways. A quiet, museum-ready surrealism with rich surface detail
